subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Seven of the 10 coaches on Jerry Kill’s staff at Minnesota have been with him for at least 14 years, and that consistency has helped give the Golden Gophers a chance at their first Big Ten title since 1967.
snippet: Seven of the 10 coaches on Jerry Kill’s staff at Minnesota have been with him for at least 14 years, and that consistency has helped give the Golden Gophers a chance at their first Big Ten title since 1967.
